scripts.dev: concurrently -n desktop,tapd,ai,terminal,ms -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "pnpm dev:desktop" "pnpm dev:tapd" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm dev:terminal" "pnpm dev:metersphere"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n tapd,ai,terminal,ms -c green,yellow,magenta,cyan "pnpm dev:tapd" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm dev:terminal" "pnpm dev:metersphere"
scripts.build:services: pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/ai-service build && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/terminal-service build && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/metersphere-service build
scripts.dist: pnpm build && pnpm prepare:services && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/desktop dist
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm build && pnpm prepare:services && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/desktop dist:mac
scripts.dist:win: pnpm build && pnpm prepare:services && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/desktop dist:win
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/desktop typecheck && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/tapd-service typecheck && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/ai-service typecheck && pnpm --filter @req-auto-mgmt/terminal-service typecheck
